gizmo385.librarymanager

Class ItemLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • gizmo385.librarymanager.ItemLibrary

  • public class ItemLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to manage a library of Items
    Author:
    cachapline8 Included search methods: tags, id, publisher, genre, author, actor, artist, song, director, developer, name label

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemLibrary()
      Default Constructor - does nothing
      ItemLibrary(Item[] items)
      Add multiple items to the library

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(Item item)
      Adds an Item to the ArrayList
      SingleLinkedList<Item> getLibrary()
      Returns to ArrayList as an Item[] array
      boolean loadLibrary()
      Loads the library from a file The library entries will be organized in the file as such: [castTag (movie, videogame, book, album)] [name] [copies] [genre] [tags] (tag 1;tag2;tag3) These will be followed by information respective to the Item specified in the castTag (i.e: Developer in VideoGame, director in Movie)
      boolean removeItem(Item item)
      Removes an Item by reference
      boolean saveLibrary()
      Saves the library to a file
      SingleLinkedList<Item> search(java.lang.String searchQuery)
      Searches based on the tags of every item

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • ItemLibrary

        public ItemLibrary()
        Default Constructor - does nothing

      • ItemLibrary

        public ItemLibrary(Item[] items)
        Add multiple items to the library
        Parameters:
        items - An array of Items to add to the list

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item item)
        Adds an Item to the ArrayList

      • removeItem

        public boolean removeItem(Item item)
        Removes an Item by reference

      • getLibrary

        public SingleLinkedList<Item> getLibrary()
        Returns to ArrayList as an Item[] array

      • search

        public SingleLinkedList<Item> search(java.lang.String searchQuery)
        Searches based on the tags of every item
        Parameters:
        searchQuery - The query to search for
        Returns:
        A SingleLinkedList instance that contains Item instances that matched the search query

      • loadLibrary

        public boolean loadLibrary()
        Loads the library from a file The library entries will be organized in the file as such: [castTag (movie, videogame, book, album)] [name] [copies] [genre] [tags] (tag 1;tag2;tag3) These will be followed by information respective to the Item specified in the castTag (i.e: Developer in VideoGame, director in Movie)
        Returns:
        Whether the load was successful or not

      • saveLibrary

        public boolean saveLibrary()
        Saves the library to a file

        The library entries will be organized in the file as such:

        • [castTag (movie, videogame, book, album)]
        • [name]
        • [copies]
        • [genre]
        • [tags] (tag 1;tag2;tag3)

        These will be followed by information respective to the Item specified in the castTag (i.e: Developer in VideoGame, director in Movie)

        Returns:
        If the save was successful or not
